article:
You say you plan to have a pet. I think it's a good idea. In the USA,keeping pets is very _ . More than _ of the families have their pets. They keep many different kinds of animals. Most of them keep dogs _ their pets. There are about 65 _ pet dogs in the country. It means that at least about 40% of America families keep pets dogs.
People are always kind to their pets. They think pets are _ of their family, and give them the best food. Some pets are too _ . They need to lose their weight! Isn't it interesting? And of course, they also have _ for pets. And being a doctor there is many people's wish.
It is interesting to have a pet. But you should be _ to love your pet when you get one. They are our friends. They will _ you much fun if you love it.
